testCaseName: Successful Restriction of Basic Account Login
name: Successful Restriction of Basic Account Login

statusDetails.message:

Call log:

description: This test verifies that a basic user can't login directly through UAE Pass integration

steps.name: Step 3: Create UAE PASS Identity provider:{uaepassAdvanced} Allow Automatic login for SOP1
Step 6:  User login with match Level 2 | Emirates ID or Unified ID
